data.title: Pooja Sharma (Nepalese actress)
data.meta_description: Pooja Sharma (born April 30, 1992 in Sindhupalchowk, Nepal) is a Nepalese actress known for her works in Nepalese Entertainment Industry.Sharma debuted as an actress in 3 Lovers (2012) where she appeared as a supporting actress. She appeared in the leading role in Madhumash opposite of actor Aaryan Sigdel. Sharma gaines recognition after her role in Ajhai Pani. The turning point in her career came from movie Prem Geet directed by Sudarshan Thapa and co-starred Pradeep Khadka. The film was a blockbuster at the box office. Since the she has starred in Ma Yesto Geet Gauxu opposite Paul Shah which was also her first production venture. It became Blockbuster at the box office. Her next film Ramkahani a multistarrer directed by Sudarshan Thapa was also hit at the box office. By these achievements, she has established herself as leading actress in Nepal.
data.text:
Beschreibung

Pooja Sharma (born April 30, 1992 in Sindhupalchowk, Nepal) is a Nepalese actress known for her works in Nepalese Entertainment Industry.Sharma debuted as an actress in 3 Lovers (2012) where she appeared as a supporting actress. She appeared in the leading role in Madhumash opposite of actor Aaryan Sigdel. Sharma gaines recognition after her role in Ajhai Pani. The turning point in her career came from movie Prem Geet directed by Sudarshan Thapa and co-starred Pradeep Khadka. The film was a blockbuster at the box office. Since the she has starred in Ma Yesto Geet Gauxu opposite Paul Shah which was also her first production venture. It became Blockbuster at the box office. Her next film Ramkahani a multistarrer directed by Sudarshan Thapa was also hit at the box office. By these achievement
